properties.areaDesc: Crawford, GA; Upson, GA; Taylor, GA; Talbot, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 9:47PM EST until January 17 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Flint River near Carsonville Hwy. 19 affecting Crawford...
Talbot...Taylor and Upson Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Flint River near Carsonville Hwy. 19.
* From this evening until late Thursday night.
* At 845 PM Tuesday the stage was 17.7 feet and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast to develop.
* Flood stage is 18 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage by late Tuesday
night and continue rising, reaching near 19.6 feet by Wednesday
evening. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage Thursday
evening.
* At 18 feet, flood Stage is reached with minor flooding beginning
along the river in the woodlands and low lying areas of fields
upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 19. The water
level will reach the top of a boat ramp by the bridge on the Taylor
County side of the river.

At 20 feet, minor flooding continues along the river in the
woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S.
Highway 19. The flood waters will cover the boat ramp up to two feet
deep, and cover a portion of the access road by the bridge on the
Taylor County side of the river.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
